changelog update

New method ConfigurationManager.resetToDefault(configurationKey)

This method is useful when after an update we need to reset default configuration values
to fix problems that we don't want to continue even though they've been fixed
with simple default configuration fixes.

imports
exported=true in .classpath
order of libraries
Replaced our LruCache Image cache for Picasso. Thanks @JakeWharton

Implemented disk caching for remote URLs.
The HttpResponse cache is shared, I know our images are not changing and
we need to save on bandwidth as much as possible. The disk cache is a
modified version of the old DiskLruImageCache, this one is general
purpose, stores byte[]'s. (Updated disklrucache from 1.3.1 to 2.0.1
which should also get rid of some errors)
